lead_paragraph: Amid confusion over new U.S. visa rules intended to deter terrorists, Rana Rahimpour was unable to fly to New York because she was born in Iran.

headline.print_headline: BBC Journalist Turned Away From Flight to U.S. Because She Was Born in Iran
headline.main: BBC Journalist Turned Away From Flight to U.S. Because She Was Born in Iran

snippet: Amid confusion over new U.S. visa rules intended to deter terrorists, Rana Rahimpour was unable to fly to New York because she was born in Iran.
